HPI 8936 Toyota Celica Twincam Turbo 1986 Safari Rally Winner B. Waldegård/F. Gallagher

14th WRC win for Björn Waldegård
8th WRC win for Toyota
5th WRC win for Celica Twincam Turbo



The 3rd win in Toyota's 3 win run on the Safari Rally from 1984 to 1986. Another resin HPI suffering from the windows separating from the resin body. :evil:
